name: O'Clock
description:
O'Clock is a puzzle platformer in an abstract world where you can control the time. Freeze platforms to solve puzzles! 

This game was made in 6weeks by 5 game design students:

Clément Audras - Game designer

Michel Bigourd - Level designer

Guillaume Welmant - Project leader

Joris Gal - 2D Artist

Mathieu Bouchonnet - Programmer
